description: '''Zeds Dead''' is a Canadian [[electronic music]] duo from [[Toronto]] consisting of Dylan Mamid, also known as '''DC''', and Zachary Rapp-Rovan, also known as '''Hooks'''. The duo rose to prominence releasing original music and remixes from 2009 to 2010 before becoming a staple on the international touring circuit thereafter. They explore a diverse variety of genres that combine aspects of [[dubstep]], [[UK garage]], [[house music|house]], [[electro house]], [[hip-hop]], [[Glitch (music)|glitch]], [[drum and bass]], and more.
